## Libraries needed for analysis 
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
library(pwr)
```

## Power Analyses for sample size
```{r}

pwr.anova.test(k = 2, f = 0.3, sig.level = 0.05, power = 0.8)
```
